affiliation: Sr. Community Gardener, Red Hat/Fedora Project
name: Karsten Wade
biography: Karsten is 15 year IT industry veteran, a long time Fedora Project contributor, and general open source iconoclast.  As a member of the industry leading community team at Red Hat, Karsten has seen, done, and recovered from many open community mistakes.  Through mistakes, learning; through learning, advancement.  By teaching and learning with others, we improve the fabric of all open source communities.
